title: Reexpert
author: Reexpert
content: In connection with the imminent launch of the browser version of our game, we would like to introduce the first Empireum Ambassador ProgramThe aim of the programme is to find like-minded people to help with a number of tasks and join us on our long, interesting and lucrative journey, making a significant contribution to the development of our metaverseOur team is looking at all sorts of specialists in their fields who will be able to perform a number of tasks:Engage: ensure engagement through active participation in discussions, campaigns, competitions and other activities organised by our team on all social media platforms at all timesEducate: educate the community by creating and translating written and visual content, such as Twitter threads, medium articles, memes and videos, supporting EmpireumPromote: as an Ambassador your primary responsibility is to build Empireum brand awareness globally and educate new members of the community. Support and build Empireum’s presence by sharing best practices with our users to help increase brand awareness and inspire community members.Benefits of working with EmpireumThe benefits of becoming an Empireum Ambassador are outlined below:Selected candidates will be recognised as official Empireum delegates.All supporters will receive a reward of $ETOM each month in proportion to their work if all requirements are met. More work = more rewards!The most ardent supporters will be recognized and featured on official Empireum resourcesEarly access to news and announcementsEarly access to closed beta tests of the game and new updatesPossibility to communicate and work with Empireum development teamRemote work opportunityNetworking opportunitiesIncreased visibility as an Influencer through mutual PRAmbassador team will share a prize fund of 15 000 000 $ETOMThe prize money will also be divided into three categories of tasks. Participants can choose their area of expertise or be a generalist, contributing to all categoriesInfluence promotion:Participants in this category will be responsible for engaging, educating and promoting on Twitter, Telegram and YouTube by:Creating posts/tweets/rollers for their community on Telegram/Twitter/YouTubeTaking part in Empireum’s AMA sessionsSpreading the word about Empireum via shillingInteraction with other participants/influencers on Twitter/Twitter/YouTubeLiking, reposting/retweeting Empireum’s posts in their sourcesCreating an information flowThe Twitter, Telegram and YouTube campaigns will be allocated 60% of the price poolVisual contentIf you are good at creating graphics this is the right place for you! To contribute to this campaign participants must complete the tasks below:Creating informative videosCreating Empireum infographicsMeme creationCreating Gifs and Stickers for Social MediaThe visual content campaign will be allocated 25% of the price poolEditorial campaignParticipants in this campaign can perform the tasks listed below:Creating informative articlesTranslating articles into any regional articlesHelping to moderate chat roomsThe editorial company will be allocated 15% of the price poolTo applyFilling in the application by google form: https://forms.gle/QnmJmJ3XKkcAeuZp9Your application will be reviewed by our team and you will receive a reply to your email with an invitation to an Ambassador chatIf you haven’t received your email, check the ‘Promotions’ section in your emailRecruitment will run until November 15thAfter November 1st there will be three google forms for each areaThe candidate should identify the area in which they are strongest and fill out a google form regarding their area
